# Coffee Day - Task 
## (submitted on 31-March-2024)

A simple web app built with React JS to have an authentication system & hosting powered by Firebase, A listing screen, cart screen and invoice generation.

![image description](data:image/png;base64,)

![image description](https://i.ibb.co/fCbhXCD/Screenshot-2024-03-31-at-11-59-47-PM.png)

![image description](https://i.ibb.co/B2Jf7Ts/Screenshot-2024-03-31-at-11-59-57-PM.png)
## Tech Stack
| Library | Version  |
| :---:   | :---: |
| React | 18.2   |
| React router | 6.x  |
| React to PDF | 1.x   |
| Sass | 1.72.x   |
| Firebase | 10.9.x   |






## Installation
Assuming you're all the pre requisites installed on your machine such as NodeJS, yarn or npm package manager.

#### Clone the repo

bash
  git clone https://github.com/sriesh-0204/coffee-day-task
  cd coffee-day-task


#### Install dependencies

bash
  yarn (or) npm i


#### Start the server locally on your machine

bash
  yarn start



    
## LOGIN screen details: Firebase Authentication system

Firebase authentication has been integrated to this project for the login screen functionality. 

Refer here: https://firebase.google.com/docs/auth

The following are leveraged from firebase/auth:-
| Method | Purpose  |
| :---:   | :---: |
| getAuth() | for getting the authentication info |
| createUserWithEmailAndPassword() | Sign up user|
| signInWithEmailAndPassword() | Sign in user |



## CART screen details : React Context API
- React Context API is used for storing and retrieving the data regarding the category listing and adding to cart portion
- However the mock data is used
- The calculation part has been taken care such as adding number of items of same type, cashier name, etc
## Invoice Generation screen: react-to-pdf
- generatePDF, Resolution, Margin are used from the library "react-to-pdf" for generating the required PDF invoice file from the added cart
- We can rename the file, set the margin, orientation and resolution
- We are showing a modal to display the cart items. Clicking on DOWNLOAD INVOICE wil download set the margin, generate the contents and download the required invoice PDF file


## Protected Routes
- We are checking whether access token is present or not
- If not, we will redirect to /login
- Else we will route to the desired page
bash
import React from 'react'
import { Navigate } from "react-router-dom";

const ProtectedRoute = ({ element }) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem("accessToken")
    return token ? element : <Navigate to="/login" replace />;
};

export default ProtectedRoute


- We are also providing the react router with the following implementation with some of the routes Protected
bash
const RouteList = () => {
  return (
    <div>
      <Router>
        <Routes>
          <Route path="/login" element={<Login />} />
          <Route
            path="/dashboard"
            element={<ProtectedRoute element={<Dashboard />} />}
          />
          <Route
            path="/signup"
            element={<ProtectedRoute element={<SignUp />} />}
          />
          <Route
            path="/cart"
            element={<ProtectedRoute element={<Cart />} />}
          />
          <Route path="/*" element={<Navigate to="/login" />} />
        </Routes>
      </Router>
    </div>
  );
};

export default RouteList;

## Future enhancements

- We can add the following to the project:-
    - Enhanced UI
    - Tailwind for 100% RWD 
    - Redux for state management and persist the data
    - eslint
    - Loaders & toast messages to indicate the app state
    - API data for category listing
    - folder structure and components
